All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
driver
The driver class is used to determine how many players are going to play the game, and creates a new instance of the startingpage class if the condition has been met once the button has been pressed.
gamepage
The gamepage is meant to display all necessary game information like the position, the usernames, the buttons, and the winner.
Snakes_and_ladders
The Snakes_and_ladders class allows the player to play the game and set their respective positions, it returns crucial information and set the starting players
startingpage
The startingpage class inherits the Snakes_and_ladders class and implements the ActionListener Interface It sets the username for both player 1 and player 2, and creates an instance of the gamepage class once both - players have set their respective names.
